title: Vivek Vajipey
main_content: Vivek Vajipey Studying Computer Science and Geophysics at Stanford University. I love building with AI, and am fascinated by how machines and humans learn. Recent Projects ExplainAI Have a conversation about what you're reading to understand it better CriticAL Automating model criticism with LLMs WorldDex A Pokédex for the real world Contact vvajipey at stanford.edu
